title: How to get inspired from Manu Kumar Jain, the Xiaomi Global Vice President - Quora

response.answer_text: He is good marketing manager of a chinese company (claims being Vice President) , who acts as a component to drive the sell of these chinese divices among poor Indians. Except his speaking and bootlicking skills(of chinese manager) there nothing to get inspired of him. There are better persons than him like Ajim Premji, Narayanmurthy,Ambani who are heads of there own Indian companies.
